Name: TDI KRISS Vector Gen.2 .40 S&W submachine gun
Description: The KRISS Vector SMG is the ideal choice for law enforcement and military seeking a controllable and compact weapon system for close quarter combat environments. The low bore axis and Super V recoil mitigation system allow for controllable shots when firing in full-automatic, or fast semi-automatic follow up shots. Compatible with Glock .40 S&W magazines.
